text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1979. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ==Births== *5 March - Érico Brás, actor, singer & comedian *20 June - Marcos Mion, TV host, actor & entrepreneur *19 July - Ellen Rocche, actress & model *28 August - Guilherme Winter, actor *14 September - Ricardo Pereira, actor, model & TV host *22 October - Júlio Rocha, actor ==Deaths== ==See also== *1979 in Brazil
title: 1979 in Brazilian television
